EmailTemplate.description: Used when an Approved Farm VIP Registration record has been edited
EmailTemplate.name: Farm VIP Reg: Approved Record has been Edited
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved Nomination for {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Registrant__c} going to {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Farm_VIP_Event__c} has been Edited
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for nominating {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Registrant__c} from {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Customer_Name__c} for the {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Farm_VIP_Event__c}.
You will be notified of approval or rejection shortly.
Link to record: {!Farm_VIP_Registration__c.Link}
Thank you,
Farm VIP Events Team
